    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"

>
[Litany of Self-Interest](/Feats.aspx?ID=1681) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=24" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 120 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
devotion spells; [tenets of evil](/Tenets.aspx?ID=2)

</column>

---

You compel a creature to act toward its own ends rather than consider others. You can cast the [_litany of self-interest_](/Spells.aspx?ID=735) devotion spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.
